zone.line: If the good money which I lent to thee
And know not where it went, be truly paid
I promise that between the N. & V.
All controversy shall thenceforth be p laid.
As many V's might then emblazoned be
Upon as many parchments as are made
Hairs on an ox's back, leaves on a tree
Might number not the V's, or give them shade —
But as we treat of compact & of band
Massuccio bids you know his volumus
Signifies - 'I will have, & out of hand
The money that I lent - away with nolumus!
I have read the alphabet to the apezand
Curse me my lord if such an N will stand.
